title: City Hall Wedding Package
seo_title: City Hall Wedding Package | Weddings at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: When you book our Wedding Package, we'll give you a bouquet of flowers, a bottle of water, chocolate on arrival, and a late checkout at our Tribeca hotel.
description: Eloping in New York City? Run back to The Frederick after you say, "I do" at City Hall. When you book our City Hall Wedding Package, we'll give you a bouquet of flowers, a bottle of water, chocolate on arrival, and a late checkout at our Tribeca boutique hotel located just three blocks from City Hall. Say "yes." You know you want to.
